pad(byte[], int) - Method in class edu.biu.scapi.paddings.BitPadding
Pads the given byte array with padSize bytes according to BitPadding padding scheme, but instead of add 10...0 bit, we add 10...0 bytes.

Perfect - Interface in edu.biu.scapi.securityLevel
This interface should be used for any primitive, scheme or protocol that achieves perfect security (e.g., a perfect MAC, one-time pad, perfectly-secure multiparty protocol, and so on).
PKCS7Padding - Class in edu.biu.scapi.paddings
Concrete padding class implements the PKCS7 padding algorithm: the input shall be padded at the trailing end with k-(lth mod k) octets all having value k-(lth mod k), where lth is the length of the input.
PKCS7Padding() - Constructor for class edu.biu.scapi.paddings.PKCS7Padding
